Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Nielsen Media Research to delay the introduction of Local People Meter service in the New York City media market until such time as sufficient studies have been conducted to ensure fair and accurate counting of all New York City viewers regardless of race, ethnicity or national origin.
Items.MatterName: Nielsen Media Research to delay the introduction of Local People Meter service in the NYC media market.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the resale of undergarments.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Monserrate, Boyland, Avella and Stewart.
